channel.title: Blog on François Lancelot
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on François Lancelot

item.title: Scikit-learn in a Vue.js app :snake:
item.description:
A Vue.js example app which runs “train_test_split” from scikit-learn with only the browser and no python server. It uses Pyodide, which is an experimental project to create a full Python data science stack that runs entirely in the browser. For more information on Pyodide, checkout this mozilla blog post.
Developed with pyodide, scikit-learn, and Vue.js. The source code is available on Github.

item.title: Visual recipes website :man_cook:
item.description:
A website that hosts recipes with an original layout.
It supports multiple languages and multiple units of measurement. Developed with phoenix/elixir. The website is available at www.myvisualrecipes.com

item.title: Sailing simulator web app :sailboat:
item.description:
A web app in which you can select the boat’s initial position, select wind orientation, select a route to follow, and run a simulation with a simple sailing model.
Developed with react-map-gl and boardgame.io. The web app is available at sailingsandbox.com ⛵ Bon vent et bonne mer (Fair winds and following seas) !

item.title: Sea life identification app :fish:
item.description:
Sea Life IDentification App is an android mobile application that can automatically identify marine life from your underwater photos and videos.
Developed with Flutter and with a custom tensorflow lite model for the classification. The app is available in Google Play Store : Sea Life ID

item.title: Using eye-tracking as input for system adaptation :eyes:
item.description: Causse, M., Lancelot, F., Maillant, J., Behrend, J., Cousy, M. and Schneider, N., 2019. Encoding decisions and expertise in the operator’s eyes: Using eye-tracking as input for system adaptation. International Journal of Human-Computer Studies, 125, pp.55-65.

item.title: Air traffic control speech recognition challenge :sound:
item.description: Pellegrini, T., Farinas, J., Delpech, E. and Lancelot, F., 2018. The Airbus Air Traffic Control speech recognition 2018 challenge: towards ATC automatic transcription and call sign detection. arXiv preprint arXiv:1810.12614.

item.title: Modern taxiing on airport ground control :airplane:
item.description: Lancelot, F., Causse, M., Schneider, N. and Mongeau, M., 2015. Human-in-the-loop multi-agent approach for airport taxiing operations. In Trends in Practical Applications of Agents, Multi-Agent Systems and Sustainability (pp. 235-236). Springer, Cham. Chua, Z., Cousy, M., Causse, M. and Lancelot, F., 2016, September. Initial assessment of the impact of modern taxiing techniques on airport ground control. In Proceedings of the International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction in Aerospace (pp.

item.title: Real-time state estimation in a flight simulator using fNIRS :bar_chart:
item.description: Gateau, T., Durantin, G., Lancelot, F., Scannella, S. and Dehais, F., 2015. Real-time state estimation in a flight simulator using fNIRS. PloS one, 10(3), p.e0121279.

item.title: Eurobot 2011 :robot:
item.description: Since 1998, Eurobot is an international robotics contest. The photo below shows the robot built in 2011 with the robotics club of INSA Toulouse.
